patch.description: Update an instance of 'CreditCards' with the given payload of type 'CreditCard' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'CreditCards' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'CreditCards' with the specified id.

post.description: Create an instance of 'CreditCards' with the given payload of type 'CreditCard' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'CreditCards' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

tags.name: CreditCards
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'CreditCards'. It defines credit cards that the company can use for incoming and outgoing payments.
